xMatixPlatform.title: xMatix Data Fabric
xMatixPlatform.description1: Connect, normalize, and govern data across systems in real time, without creating another data silo.
xMatixPlatform.description2: Bring together transactional data, master data, and events into a single operational view that powers real-time execution and intelligence across every xMatix module.

whatIsIt.title: What it is
whatIsIt.description2:
xMatix Data Fabric is a unified operational data layer that connects transactional data, master data, and events across all xMatix modules. 
It provides a consistent, trusted data foundation that workflows, rules, and intelligence can act on in real time, without duplicating data or disrupting existing systems of record.

whyItMatters.title: Why It Matters
whyItMatters.description2:
Traditional enterprise systems fragment data by function, creating gaps in context as work moves across teams and systems. 
 xMatix Data Fabric preserves operational context across processes by maintaining shared domain data models and real-time data synchronization. This enables faster execution, better decisioning, and intelligence that operates on complete, current information.

data.coreCapabilitiesDescription: These shared data capabilities ensure consistent execution, trusted insights, and governed automation across domains.
data.worksWithDescription: All xMatix modules run on the same execution platform.  Sales, Service, Warehouse, Inventory, Procurement, Finance, Payroll, People, and Partners share a common foundation for workflows, data context, & governance.

coreCapabilitiesCard1.title: Shared domain data models
coreCapabilitiesCard1.content: Define consistent entities such as customers, products, locations, partners, and employees across all modules.

coreCapabilitiesCard2.title: Event streams and history
coreCapabilitiesCard2.content: Capture real-time events and historical changes to support live workflows and continuous execution.

coreCapabilitiesCard3.title: Operational analytics feeds
coreCapabilitiesCard3.content: Expose execution-ready data to analytics and intelligence layers without separate pipelines or data duplication.

coreCapabilitiesCard4.title: Audit-ready data lineage
coreCapabilitiesCard4.content: Track data origins, changes, and usage across workflows to support compliance and traceability.
